data.title: Good sandwich and they deliver for a very reasonable charge.
data.text: Only reason for 3 stars is because it's really just a fast food place. Don't expect ambiance when you eat there. The restaurants are clearly designed for quick in-and-out dining. That being said, the pitas are very good and I really like the fact that they deliver for about a buck.

data.title: Great food.. great staff!
data.text:
Absolutely one of the best places to eat in Idaho... hadn't been in for a couple months... and still the cook remembered me....they remember my order and I have never had even a mediocre experience.  Always excellent food ..  
Always extremely friendly, excellent customer service, and very very good food. 

We have eaten here easily over 60 times in the last yr....and one thing we love is the consistency of the food, and customer service.

data.title: Love, love, love Pita Pit!
data.text: They just make a really great pita, and their stuff is always so fresh. It's no wonder, they probably make a thousand pitas a day. They'll deliver (for $1) and they are good folks. I visit them often.

data.title: Fresh and delicious!
data.text: Everyone in the family loves Pita Pit. We love the excellent selection of fresh veggies and when they get added to the hot, grilled meat choices, yum! The staff are consistently friendly and helpful also.

data.title: Great food served in a Pita
data.text: This a great place to eat. We have been there 3 times and the food is cooked fresh and taste great. Our Favorite is the Double meat Prime Rib with Chipotle sauce. You can have a wheat or  white Pita. They have many Fresh veggies you can add to your Pita. They also offer 3 different kinds of cheese. The pit also offers salads. We will go back.

data.title: Super clean! Friendly staff!
data.text: My husband and I have been here many times. Probably 20+ times since they opened. Super clean restaurant, fresh ingredients, great smoothies, awesome pita's, yummy cookies, huge selection of drinks, and every staff member is friendly! We receive awesome coupons every time we go! They just added a new outside dining area. We are happy to see Pita Pit in Nampa! The owner is definitely making sure customers are happy! We are very pleased every time we go!

data.title: One of the best places to eat in idaho...
data.text: The food tastes very fresh.... everytime....staff is EXCELLENT......and customer service is the best I have seen in yrs....anywhere.... I don't care what restaurant you compare it too.... ( I've been to idaho's "top" restaurants)..... I've spent 75 to 100 a plate,  and I'll tell you what... this is as delicious if not more so.... I know... sounds crazy... but when you taste it...and the freshness of the lettuce...sprouts, ...etc... you'll understand my joy in discovering this gem.... it's an did must stop...must eat place.... and with so far flawless customer service ( we've Been there like 25 times in last few months).... AND a good size meal for a great price.... you've GOT to try it....
